K

k - Variable in class it.cnr.isti.wnlab.indoornavigation.utils.localization.fingerprint.FingerprintStrategy
 
KalmanFilter - Interface in it.cnr.isti.wnlab.indoornavigation.filters.kalmanfilter
Kalman Filter interface.
KalmanFilterStrategy - Class in it.cnr.isti.wnlab.indoornavigation.utils.localization.kalmanfilter
A simple localization strategy that: - The main position is defined by PDR - PDR is refined with error correction using Magnetic Mismatch - Magnetic Mismatch positions are inscribed in a circular fence having the Wifi fingerprint-found position as its center.
KalmanFilterStrategy(XYPosition, FloorMap, PDR, DistancesMap<XYPosition, AccessPoints>, DistancesMap<XYPosition, MagneticField>, float) - Constructor for class it.cnr.isti.wnlab.indoornavigation.utils.localization.kalmanfilter.KalmanFilterStrategy
